descriptionHtml:
Oil body+tutorial+data

Don't forget to back up your data

Recomended mods :
-Sporty sexy sweat

How to use :
just extract/copy data to data/meshes/actors/character/character assets
____________________________________________________________________________________________

If you want to know how to make oil i'll give tutorial but if you don't know just extract the data folder to the skyrim direction
____________________________________________________________________________________________

Tutorial to give your character oil without enb

NB : Don't forget back up your data in data/meshes/actor/character/character asset

1.you must have nifskope and install
2.open nifskope
3.load the femalebody_1.nif for give oil to the body
4.Look no 1 at screenshot and click ninode->nitrishape->bslightingshaderproperty
5.and now look no 2 at screenshot and look no 3
6.change glossiness from 30.0000 to 1000.0000
7.and specular strength from 3.0000 to 9.0000
8.save as and enjoy the view

Credit by me YI/IAM
author: IndraAM
